post:
Shared Web Hosting Available in 4 Regions: USA, UK, Europe and Asia


Inventive Hosting have been providing fast and reliable hosting services since 2004.

  • 15 Years in the web hosting industry
  • SSD Drives in RAID 10 as standard
  • CloudLinux Operating System
  • LiteSpeed Enterprise Web Server with Lscache
  • MariaDB & PostgreSQL Databases
  • Daily & Weekly Backups kept for 31 days (Jet Backup)
  • Free cPanel account migration (We will migrate your cPanel Accounts, free of charge!)
  • 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
  • FREE SSL Certificates (Let’s Encrypt)
  • PHP Version Selector
  • Choice of Locations: USA, UK, Netherlands and Singapore (West Coast -Los Angeles, London and Rotterdam)


=========
Our Support
==========

24/7/365 Support
Email & Ticket Support
English speaking support team

=======
Reviews
=======

See our latest reviews on our facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/pg/inventive.hosting/reviews

**** 25% off your for first year using the following code “HD19" **** (enter at checkout)

=============
Payment Methods
=============

We accept all major Credit/Debit Cards, PayPal and Bank Transfer.


==========
Developer Tools
==========

  • Git
  • Perl
  • PostgreSQL
  • Python
  • Ruby on Rails
  • NodeJS
